answers.answer: His aortic valve should be assessed and it probably was with the echo, since it wasn't mentioned as abnormal, because it may cause LVH.  The other thing, more common cause of LVH, is poorly controlled Blood pressure.  Both of these can cause LVH. The fact that it's mentioned as borderline would not concern me too much.  I would just make sure that the above are checked for.  Often times the echo overestimated LV size so I would suggest having another one done in a year or so.

title: Borderline concentric LV hypertrophy
